datasets.name: 99313fb4
queryLines:
USE CATALOG `main`;
USE SCHEMA `default`;

SELECT 
  *, 
  CASE 
    WHEN fraud_score >= 70 AND fraud_score < 75 THEN '70-75'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 75 AND fraud_score < 80 THEN '75-80'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 80 AND fraud_score < 85 THEN '80-85'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 85 AND fraud_score < 90 THEN '85-90'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 90 AND fraud_score < 95 THEN '90-95'
    WHEN fraud_score >= 95 THEN '95+'
  END AS fraud_score_category
FROM telecommunications.fraud_data.transaction_risk

filters.expression: `fraud_score_category` NOT IN ('95+') AND `fraud_score_category` IS NOT NULL

lines: Auto block engine: using rules to automatically block suspicious transactions
Pipeline status: using rules to flag suspicious transactions for analyst review

frame.title: $ lost by passing through auto block

lines: BUY: any purchase activity (new phone, service,... ) vs CHANGE: any change activity in account (change name, address, ...)
total volume of cases auto block definition pending cases definition

frame.title: False Positive Cases - review and improve auto block engine (enhance/remove rule)
False Negative Cases - review and improve auto block engine (add rule)
